name: BrightEdge Autopilot
author: BrightEdge

sections.description:
BrightEdge, the global leader in enterprise organic search and content performance, empowers marketers to transform online content into business results, such as traffic, conversions, and revenue. The BrightEdge platform is powered by a sophisticated deep-learning engine and is the only company capable of web-wide, real-time measurement of content engagement across all digital channels, including search, social, and mobile. BrightEdge’s 1,800+ customers include global brands, such as Microsoft and Adobe as well as 57 of the Fortune 100. The company has eight offices worldwide and is headquartered in Foster City, California.

BrightEdge Autopilot is the industry’s first self-driving SEO technology. Following on from the groundbreaking release of BrightEdge Instant, which brought real-time insights and recommendations to marketers for search and digital channels, such as YouTube and Amazon, BrightEdge Autopilot auto-optimizes many aspects of SEO including mobile. BrightEdge Autopilot now adds hundreds more global deployments across consumer brands, media companies and enterprises. BrightEdge Autopilot brings smart, end-to-end automation of SEO, now adding mobile page and image optimization. Within 6 months of deployment, over 1,000 brands are now using BrightEdge Autopilot to power Self-Driving SEO.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress Plugin Directory directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin on the BrightEdge Settings Page
sections.changelog:
1.1.13 =
* Release date: Nov 29, 2023

Update

  • Added a fix to shortcode to support newer themes

    1.1.12 =

  • Release date: Aug 18, 2023

Update

  • Updated wordpress supported version to 6.3

    1.1.11 =

  • Release date: July 13, 2023

Update

  • Updated wordpress supported version to 6.2.2 and PHP version 8.2

1.1.10

  • Release date: January 19, 2023

Update

  • Handle potential security vulnerability in codebase

1.1.9

  • Release date: July 28, 2022

Update

  • Update default direct api endpoint and Update core php BEIXFClient class

1.1.8

  • Release date: Feb 4, 2022

Update

  • Updated wordpress supported version to 5.9 And Fixed an issue for shortcode tag

1.1.7

  • Release date: Dec 17, 2020

Update

  • Added fix for shortcode if the body content is empty

1.1.6

  • Release date: June 29, 2020

Update

  • Change WordPress hook for link block

1.1.5

  • Release date: June 16, 2020

Update

  • Support api.brightedge.com endpoint

1.1.4

  • Release date: June 10, 2020

Update

  • Support debug info
  • Remove filter to avoid multiple injection

1.1.3

  • Release date: May 27, 2020

Update

  • Support body_open and body_1 at the same time

1.1.2

  • Release date: May 5, 2020

Update

  • Update Autopilot PHP SDK to 1.5.1

1.1.1

  • Release date: April 30, 2020

Update

  • Update Autopilot PHP SDK to 1.4.30

1.1.0

Update

  • Simplify the setting page.
  • Update to version 1.4.29 of PHP SDK.

1.0.0

Update

  • Implement the basic function of plugin, including setting page and integrate PHP SDK.
